text:
reproducible (always) by:
- going to the demo site
- logging in to the default pub as the lenya
- goto admin section
- goto ipranges
- click on add ip range button
- click on any link on lenya sidebar

or

- going to the demo site
- logging in to the default pub as the lenya
- goto admin section
- goto users
- click on CMS user button
- click on any link on lenya sidebar

resultant stacktrace:

An Error Occurred

Document ID [] does not start with '/'!

org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DocumentBuildException: Document ID [] does not
start with '/'!

does not start with '/'!
